txt.en: Complete the deeds of the Gundabad Instances.
Far under Mount Gundabad lies the Den of Pughlak, the realm of the deepest of the deep toads.

High among the catwalks of Deepscrave lies Dhúrstrok, the stronghold of Gorgar the Ruthless. Somewhere within these aging halls filled with dwarf-relics, Gorgar's loyal generals have imprisoned Lord Náin. It is up to you to free him.

Deep in the Pit of Stonejaws, a grand tomb holds the remains of the many ancient dwarf-lords of Gundabad. The necromancer Loknashra, now empowered with the spirit of Drugoth, has returned to raise an army and claim her vengeance upon all those who wronged her.
Complete 'Bring Peace to the Houses of Rest'
Complete 'Delver of the Den of Pughlak'
Stand firmly against the greatest evils within and above the Three Peaks of Gundabad.
